title: Consultor SCP
description:
- Developed enterprise solutions with Java for internal applications and client projects, improving operational efficiency and optimizing key company processes.
- Participated in integrations with ERP systems using JavaScript, SAPUI5, and XSJS on SAP HANA, developing both the frontend and services, which enabled smoother integration between systems.
- Strengthened skills in web development and service architecture by implementing critical functionalities in enterprise environments, contributing to the growth and continuous improvement of internal projects.

title: Systems Assistant (Trainee)
description: - I developed a Java web application to manage and centralize information from the Human Talent area, optimizing control and access to supplier data, improving operational efficiency, and reducing data management time.
